mapper.insert: insert into tbl_review (reviewno, itemcode, userid, content) values (seq_review.nextval, #{itemCode}, #{userID}, #{content})
mapper.update: update tbl_review set content = #{content} where reviewNo = #{reviewNo}
mapper.select: select reviewNo, itemcode, userid, content, reviewdate from tbl_review where itemCode = #{itemCode} order by reviewNo asc
